Hey everybody who needs a crack go to (gamecopyworld.com) they have cracks, trainers, etc... I'm pretty sure you'll find something. I'm still downloading this game so I have yet to see myself.

Well screw gamecopyworld.com, the cracks are in the file ViTALiTY which you extract from the vty-clde .rar, just copy the files over the files in the Bin folder found in the directory you saved the game to.   (that should be pretty easy to understand even for someone who's never used a crack before)

If you guys aren't sure which one to download I would opt for this one because it definitely works, at least for me on WinXP.

SimCity 4 is more refined but this game is well done and it's fun walking through the city.

There is one thing I noticed that isn't realistic: in the bad areas I don't see any Puerto Ricans waving their arms around or spray painting graffiti.
